pages.text: Check out our ! weekly specials Monday - Friday Happy Hour House Liquor, House Wine and Local Draughts all $6 each Wednesday RUN CBW Every Wednesday at 7pm$5 Local Brews for all runners Thursday Bar + Music Bingo Bar Bingo Every 3rd Thursday + Music Bingo on Last Thursday Friday Live Music Sam Adams Music Series$5 Sam Lager and Sam Seasonal Saturday & SUnday Pitcher Specials $12 Bud Light$15 Michelob Ultra$15 Sam Adams Over 1,250,000 Pints and Counting! It’s simple. We created Charleston Beer Works with these things in mind...friends, cold beer, best friends, fresh food, more friends and an extra helping of sports. We are a come as you are Charleston bar- a craft beer bar, a modern sports bar and a fresh kitchen wrapped into one great place. A place where the Charleston locals and our friends that are visiting want to comeback for more. Enjoy the downstairs bar, the upstairs bar or a great seat on the patio...whatever vibe you’re feeling! At CBW, our team works hard everyday so you can relax and enjoy your free time. Our Certified Beer Servers are here to guide you across a long list of local and regional craft beers, updated weekly. We have over 48 beers on tap, in addition to the classic favorites, plenty more in bottles and cans - and yes, a growing, impressive list of premium spirits and wines. Charleston Beer Works features made from scratch bar foods, with a daily special or two, and live entertainment Thursday through Saturday to keep the good times rolling! Lively, Uncomplicated...and yes, beer is always the answer. What was the question? CBW: Visit Us 480 King Street Charleston, SC 29403 (843) 577-5885
